name: Keep The Light On (Lasse, tuslir, idalikerbeikon, PBC33)
name_original: Keep The Light On (Lasse, tuslir, idalikerbeikon, PBC33)
description:
You are the Lighthouse Keeper and your job is of the utmost importance. You keep the light on, guiding the way for weary sailors braving the dark ocean. 

It is a lonely life, alone with no companions but your thoughts and the drone of work. Down the stairs, then up again. You hear the storm outside, looking out the old, stained windows at the top of the lighthouse. 

And then you hear it ...

---

Designer's Note:
Game controls through mouse and keyboard.
Press F to interact with objects.
Esc ends the experience and forces the player out of the game. There is no pause function.

Keep The Light On is inspired by the classic PS1 era, focusing on its old-school stylized graphics and technical limitations. 
The product was produced over a period of 3 days in collaboration with students from 3D-graphics and Game Design. 
We hope you enjoy this short little experience.
